mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_data_tables
ds_id, schema_id, schema_name, table_name, table_name_alias, physical_table_regex, output_topic, ver_id, status, create_time, meta_change_flg, batch_id, ver_change_history, ver_change_notice_flg, output_before_update_flg, description, fullpull_col, fullpull_split_shard_size, fullpull_split_style,
#{dsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schemaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schemaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicalTableRegex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputTopic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{metaChangeFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verChangeHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verChangeNoticeFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outputBeforeUpdateFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullpullCol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullpullSplitShardSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullpullSplitStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: UPDATE t_data_tables SET ver_id= #{verId} WHERE id = #{tableId}
mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.ds_name, t2.ds_type,t2.ctrl_topic, t3.version, t3.inner_version from t_data_tables t1 left join t_dbus_datasource t2 on t1.ds_id = t2.id left join t_meta_version t3 on t1.ver_id = t3.id where 1=1 and t1.ds_id = #{dsId} and t1.schema_name like "%"#{schemaName}"%" and t1.table_name like "%"#{tableName}"%" order by t1.create_time desc
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.id = #{id}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.status = #{status}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t2.id = #{dsID}
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.schema_id = #{schemaID}
select *, t2.ds_name from t_data_tables t1 left join t_dbus_datasource t2 on t1.ds_id = t2.id where t1.ds_id = #{dsID} and t1.schema_name = #{schemaName}
select * from t_data_tables t1 ,t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.ver_id is null and t1.schema_id = #{schemaId}
mapper.delete: delete tt,tc,tv,tm from t_data_tables tt left join t_encode_columns tc on tt.id=tc.table_id left join t_meta_version tv on tt.id = tv.table_id left join t_table_meta tm on tv.id = tm.ver_id where tt.id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ds.id,ds.ds_name dsName, ds.ds_type dsType FROM t_data_tables tables,t_dbus_datasource ds WHERE tables.ds_id = ds.id
select * from t_dbus_datasource d,t_data_tables t where t.ds_id = d.id and d.ds_name=#{dsName} and t.schema_name=#{schemaName} and t.table_name=#{tableName}
select * from t_dbus_datasource d,t_data_tables t where t.ds_id = d.id and t.schema_id=#{schemaId} and t.table_name=#{tableName}

SELECT tdds.`ds_name`, tdds.`ds_type`, tdds.`master_url`, tdds.`slave_url`, tdds.`dbus_user`, tdds.`dbus_pwd`, ifnull (tdds.`ds_partition`, 0) ds_partition, tdds.`topic`, tds.`schema_name`, tds.`src_topic`, tdt.`table_name`, tdt.`output_topic` FROM `t_data_tables` tdt, `t_data_schema` tds, `t_dbus_datasource` tdds WHERE tdt.`id` = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tdt.`schema_id` = tds.`id` AND tdt.`ds_id` = tdds.`id`

select t1.*, t2.ds_name,t2.ds_type,t2.ctrl_topic, t3.version, t3.inner_version from t_data_tables t1 left join t_dbus_datasource t2 on t1.ds_id = t2.id left join t_meta_version t3 on t1.ver_id = t3.id order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT tt.id, pt.topo_name, dt.table_name, dt.physical_table_regex, tt.output_topic, dt.schema_name, dd.ds_name, dd.ds_type, dd.ctrl_topic, mv.version, dt.create_time, s.url FROM t_project_topo_table tt JOIN t_project_topo pt ON tt.topo_id = pt.id JOIN t_sink s ON tt.sink_id = s.id JOIN t_project_user pu ON tt.project_id = pu.project_id AND pu.user_id = #{userId} JOIN t_data_tables dt ON tt.table_id = dt.id LEFT JOIN t_dbus_datasource dd ON dt.ds_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN t_meta_version mv ON dt.ver_id = mv.id ORDER BY dt.create_time DESC
mapper.update: update t_data_tables set status='inactive' where ds_id = #{dsId}
update t_data_tables set status='inactive' where schema_id = #{schemaId}
mapper.select: select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.ds_id = #{dsId} and (t1.status = 'ok' or t1.status = 'waiting')
select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.schema_id = #{schemaId} and (t1.status = 'ok' or t1.status = 'waiting')

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(tds.ds_name separator ';') ds_names, tdt.table_name, count(*) cnt FROM t_data_tables tdt, t_dbus_datasource tds WHERE tdt.ds_id = tds.id AND tdt.table_name in (#{tables}) AND tdt.ds_id in (#{dsIds}) GROUP BY tdt.table_name

SELECT DISTINCT td.id, td.ds_name FROM t_data_tables tt, t_dbus_datasource td WHERE tt.ds_id = td.id AND tt.id IN
#{item}

select * from t_data_tables t1, t_dbus_datasource t2 where t1.ds_id = t2.id and t1.id in
#{item}
